answers.answer: Hi there!You could try diet modification (increased proteins/ lower carbohydrates) and exercises like swimming, yoga etc., that put little stress on the lower back. You may also benefit from physiotherapy that would help in strengthening back muscles.Hope this is helpful.Take care!

question: hi,I am 34yrs old female.I am 95kgs and my height is 5'8"and i have diabetes since 7years.I have a slip disc too of L4-L5 aND L5 DISC HERNIATION. i HAVE TERRIBLE PAIN IN MY hip and my toes are numb too. I am married with no kids. Can anyone suggest any excersise which can first help to reduce my weight as i am unable to walk for long distances due to slip disc.
title: L4-L5 slip disc with diabetes
